value_type.description: The data type of the value of the metafield draft order.

owner_id.description: The unique identifier of the owner (e.g., shop) associated with the metafield draft order.

created_at.description: The date and time when the metafield draft order was created.

description.description: The textual description of the metafield draft order.

type.description: The type of the metafield draft order.

updated_at.description: The date and time when the metafield draft order was last updated.

shop_url.description: The URL of the shop to which the metafield draft order belongs.

admin_graphql_api_id.description: The unique identifier of the metafield draft order within the admin GraphQL API.

namespace.description: The namespace of the metafield draft order.

id.description: The unique identifier of the metafield draft order.

value.description: The value of the metafield draft order.

owner_resource.description: The type of owner resource (e.g., shop) associated with the metafield draft order.

key.description: The key associated with the metafield draft order.
